body:
We have two new dual opteron 246s running 64 bit linux (2.6.8) (Fedora 
Core 2). Compiling with -m64 -O3 seems to produce faster code, but I 
have not done any intensive testing yet. We have been running AMDs 
(athlon mps) for quite a while and been very happy with the price 
performance. Someone did mention that the performance of  the Intel EM64 
(don't know if this is P4 or Xeon) may be pretty good as well, but I 
really do not have any data points on this.


-Jack
___
